title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
We are seeking a Senior DevOps Engineer to join our platform team. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining our cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines.

Responsibilities:
- Manage and scale Kubernetes clusters on AWS
- Implement Infrastructure as Code using Terraform
- Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines with GitLab
- Monitor production systems and implement observability solutions
- Collaborate with development teams on deployment strategies
- Participate in on-call rotation with compensation
- Lead incident response and post-mortem processes

Requirements:
- 5+ years of DevOps/SRE experience
- Strong experience with AWS (EKS, EC2, RDS, IAM)
- Proficiency in Terraform and Infrastructure as Code
- Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
- Knowledge of monitoring tools (CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana)
- Python or Bash scripting skills
- Experience with GitLab CI/CD or similar
- Understanding of security best practices

What we offer:
- Competitive salary $120,000-$150,000
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
- 401k with 6% company matching
- Flexible remote work with home office budget
- Professional development budget ($3,000/year)
- On-call compensation and reasonable rotation
- Blameless post-mortem culture
- Generous PTO and mental health days
requirements: Strong experience with AWS (EKS, EC2, RDS, IAM)
Proficiency in Terraform and Infrastructure as Code
Knowledge of monitoring tools (CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana)
